page.title: 11Perranporth Park
page.content: {Perranporth Camping and Touring Park is at the top of Budnic Estate by Budnic Hill.Mr.and Mrs.Homes own it.In {August}it is very busy because the children are on holiday. They have over a 1ooo people when it is very busy.In June they have about 50 to 60 people.They have a television room and a bar which children are not allowed in.They have some swings,slide,climb- ing frame and a roundabout. They have a heated swimming pool. Some people bring their dogs but they have to keep it on a lead and they are not allowed in the childrens play area.They have two chalets and six caravans.They have an{on_site mini supermarket}which sells food, milk, ice creams, sweets and gas.They have toilets and a washing room, tumble drier and a washing machine.They have a{Welsh {mountain pony}to give rides.
